tips: Pro Tip: Always format the SD card in the dash cam, not on a computer.
Pro Tip: Use a high-endurance SD card rated for video surveillance.
Pro Tip: Replace SD cards every 6â€“12 months for optimal performance.

faq.question: Why does my dash cam keep saying 'SD card error'?
faq.answer: This usually indicates the card is corrupted or incompatible. Try reformatting or replacing it with a high-endurance model.

faq.question: Can I use any SD card with my fleet dash cam?
faq.answer: Not all SD cards are rated for continuous write operations. Use ones recommended by the manufacturer.
